Attributes.description: Students will apply theory and concepts from a life course perspective in provision of nursing care to persons living with mental health challenges and their families.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of NURS 300, NURS 310, NURS 321, NURS 322, NURS 330, NURS 352, NURS 360.
Attributes.coreq: Co-reqs: NURS 303 and one of NURS 323, NURS 401.
